title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLMs, embeddings, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-user support and model manager.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting streaming, custom options, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal cross-platform desktop GUI built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for retrieval pipelines using Ollama generators and embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and streaming chat support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with async and streaming capabilities.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles for fine-tuned and niche models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building private RAG pipelines with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app for mentioning and DM-ing Ollama models in workspaces.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and summarization via local Ollama models.
